title: iRecipe
description: iRecipe is a real-world front-end application recipe and food image generator app that provides users with access to a large collection of recipes and corresponding images, including international dishes.

title: Weather forecast Dashboard
description: A 5 day forecast page that uses information fetched from a third party api. I learned about fetch requests and breaking down json data.

title: Work Day Planner
description: A planner based on a standard 9 to 5 work day. Users are possible to input plans for there day and save using local storage, another feature i implemented is color co-ordination based on past present or future.

title: Random password Generator
description: A random password generator that asks a series of questions through prompts then creates a random password based on the answers you input.

title: My Portfolio
description: My First portfolio created with HTML,CSS AND JS. I had a lot of fun creating this mobile first portfolio and learned a lot about media queries along the way.

title: Refactor Challenge
description: This was the first weeks assignment for my boot-camp. I had to refactor someone elses code to make it accessible
